headline.main: RECEIVES LEGION HEAD; Roosevelt Voices Pleasure at Endorsement of Foreign Policy

abstract: Stambaugh visits Roosevelt; invites him to attend Armistice Day celebration and next yr's conv; Roosevelt pleased at legion backing
snippet: Stambaugh visits Roosevelt; invites him to attend Armistice Day celebration and next yr's conv; Roosevelt pleased at legion backing...

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
